remarks: An ordered pair theorem for nonnegative integers.  Theorem 17.3 of [Quine] p. 124.  See comments for ~ nn0opthi .  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2004.)
statement:
nn0opth.1 $e |- A e. NN0 $.
nn0opth.2 $e |- B e. NN0 $.
nn0opth.3 $e |- C e. NN0 $.
nn0opth.4 $e |- D e. NN0 $.
nn0opth2i $p |- ( ( ( ( A + B ) ^ 2 ) + B ) = ( ( ( C + D ) ^ 2 ) + D ) <-> ( A = C /\ B = D ) ) $.
